content: Dan Li Dan Li IEEE Fellow Professor, Department of Computer Science & Technology, Tsinghua University Email: tolidan@tsinghua.edu.cn Address: F11, Ziqiang Building, Tsinghua University, Beijing, 100084, China Biography | Services | Teaching | Publications I am continuously looking for highly motivated postdoc/phd/master/intern students to do research on computer network and system. Those who want to join my group please send your resume to my emailbox. Biography I am a full professor in the Department of Computer Science and Technology, Tsinghua University. I lead the NASP (Network Architecture, System and Protocol) research lab. I received my Ph.D in computer science from Tsinghua University in 2007. My research area is computer network and system, with focuses on data center network, AI system and trustworthy Internet architecture. I have published more than 100 technical papers in referred conferences and journals, including ACM SIGCOMM, USENIX NSDI, IEEE S&P, USENIX Security, ACM CCS, ISOC NDSS, IEEE/ACM Transactions on Networking, etc. I served as an associate editor for IEEE Transactions on Computers and IEEE Transactions on Cloud Computing, a general co-chair for IEEE LANMAN 2015 and APNet 2018, a TPC co-chair for IEEE LANMAN 2014 and APNet 2025, as well as a TPC member for conferences such as ACM SIGCOMM, USENIX NSDI, etc. I am a fellow of IEEE. Professional Services Journal Editor IEEE Transactions on Cloud Computing, Associate Editor, 2024.11-now. IEEE Transactions on Wireless Communications, Associate Editor, 2019.1-2020.12. IEEE Transactions on Computers, Associate Editor, 2013.9-2015.8. Conference Steering Committee APNet, 2018-now. Conference Chair TPC Co-chair: IEEE LANMAN 2014, APNet 2025. General Co-chair: IEEE LANMAN 2015, APNet 2018. TPC Area Chair: ICNP 2024, 2025. Conference TPC Member ACM SIGCOMM 2019, 2025; USENIX NSDI 2026; IEEE ICNP 2020, 2022, 2023.
